scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a microfilm copy of Hugh Scott's 1949 book How to go into Politics, an introductory guide explaining how one can get involved in politics. The book includes a chapter on women in politics, and is inscribed by the author to his wife. The microfilm is missing pp. 55-70; pp. 71-86 are filmed twice.
